title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running large language models locally with a single command.
highlights: pull & run Llama-3, Mistral, Gemma, etc.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed via simple API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to talk with Ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama for chains, agents and retrieval.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model, self-host in minutes.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for integrating Ollama into Rails or scripts.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI (text UI) client for chatting with Ollama models in the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local LLM code completions via Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models for generative QA & RAG.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async streams and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama containers for CI pipelines and dev tasks.

title: ollama-qt
summary: Lightweight Qt6 desktop GUI for chatting with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-vector
summary: Plugin that adds native vector/embedding endpoints to Ollama for semantic search.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that answers questions using Ollama models, deployable on Fly.io.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI note assistance, summarization and Q&A via Ollama.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve example deploying Ollama for scalable local inference.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord.py bot bringing Ollama chat, image-to-text and moderation to servers.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language wrapper for Ollama with async HTTP and WebSocket support.
